spotifyr 1.1.0
  • Reference

Get features and popularity for an artist's entire discography on Spotify

Source: R/artists.R
get_artist_audio_features.Rd

This function returns the popularity and audio features for every song and album for a given artist on Spotify

get_artist_audio_features(artist = NULL, album_types = "album",
  return_closest_artist = TRUE, access_token = get_spotify_access_token(),
  parallelize = FALSE, future_plan = "multiprocess")

Arguments

artist

String of artist name or Spotify artist URI
album_types

Character vector of album types to include. Valid values are "album", "single", "appears_on", and "compilation". Defaults to "album".
return_closest_artist

Boolean for selecting the artist result with the closest match on Spotify's Search endpoint. Defaults to TRUE.
access_token

Spotify Web API token. Defaults to spotifyr::get_spotify_access_token()
parallelize

Boolean determining to run in parallel or not. Defaults to FALSE.
future_plan

String determining how `future()`s are resolved when `parallelize == TRUE`. Defaults to multiprocess.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
radiohead_features <- get_artist_audio_features(artist_name = 'radiohead')
# }
